Text: Section of Environment Energy and Resources Leadership Director y UpdateTo ABA Section of Environment Energy and Resources Section Leadership Re Section Leadership Directory Updates As of the following updates have been made to the Section Leadership Directory Please note these changes in your directory Directory Page Number Member Name Thomas Kiehnhoff Business Fax Directory Page Number Member Name Karen Mignone Email Address Directory Page Number Member Name Laura J Nagle Firm Name Davis Graham Stubbs LLP Address Seventeenth Street Suite Directory Page Number Member Name Amy Royden Firm Name STAPPAALAPCO Address N Capitol Street NW Suite City State Zip Washington DC Phone Number Fax Number Email Address SONetssoorg Directory Page Number Member Name Scott Sachs Address Cochran Av Apt City State Zip Los Angeles CA Phone Number Fax Number None Email Address If there are any changes to your personal information please contact Section staff Fred Faulkner mailto or Sharyne Tu mailto Also please contact the ABA at membersjoincoahtml with any changes Thank you To unsubscribe reply to this message with the word unsubscribe in the subject line To review our privacy statement go to privacystatementhtml To change your email address or remove your name from any future general distribution emails complete the form at membersjoincoahtml Visit wwwabanetorgenviron Questions mailto or call Copyright American Bar Association Section of Environment Energy and Resources
